item.description: 動態網頁爬蟲 Bobson Lin 2020-01-31 Made with WebSlides OUTLINE Common Methods Using Selenium Practice: Crawling ETTODAY Practice: Crawling ETTODAY Nested Common Methods ||| ||| 1. API 請求 2. 模擬瀏覽器 Using Selenium 1. Installation pip install selenium – 2. Download the WebDriver binary selenium.dev/documentation - Driver requirements – 3. Getting started from selenium import webdriver driver = webdriver.Chrome() driver.get('https://selenium.dev') print(driver.page_source) driver.close() Practice: Crawling ETTODAY ||| browser = webdriver.Chrome() browser.
